targets.expr: avg( 100-  (  node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype !="tmpf", mountpoint!="/boot" } / node_filesystem_size_bytes{ fstype !="tmpfs", mountpoint!="/boot"} ) * 100 )
sum ( node_filesystem_size_bytes{ fstype !="tmpfs", mountpoint!="/boot"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype !="tmpfs", mountpoint!="/boot"} ) by ( instance)
